title: Tom Pidcock Says Tour de France Dates Won’t Derail Olympic Ambitions: ‘It’s on the Limit’
content:
CX will play a limited role this winter, and Ineos Grenadiers star believes time is on his side in a bid for the Tour de France: 'I need to be patient.'

Read the full article at Tom Pidcock Says Tour de France Dates Won’t Derail Olympic Ambitions: ‘It’s on the Limit’ on Velo.
